incidents.title: RESOLVED: We are investigating elevated error rates with multiple products in us-east1
incidents.message: Incident began at 2025-07-18 07:42 and ended at 2025-07-18 09:47 (all times are US/Pacific ). # Incident Report ## Summary On Friday, 18 July 2025 07:50 US/Pacific, several Google Cloud Platform (GCP) and Google Workspace (GWS) products experienced elevated latencies and error rates in the us-east1 region for a duration of up to 1 hour and 57 minutes. GCP Impact Duration: 18 July 2025 07:50 - 09:47 US/Pacific : 1 hour 57 minutes GWS Impact Duration: 18 July 2025 07:50 - 08:40 US/Pacific : 50 min
affected_products: Pause non-critical workflows until safety controls are implemented (complete).
Strengthen safety controls for hardware upgrade workflows by end of Q3 2025.
Design and implement a mechanism to prevent control plane partitioning in case of dual failure of upstream routers by end of Q4 2025.

incidents.title: Shai-Hulud 2.0 Supply Chain Incident – No Customer Impact
incidents.message: Nov 26 , 00:00 UTC Resolved - Informational (No Customer Action Required) Deepgram identified that our internal development environment was affected as part of the industry-wide Shai-Hulud 2.0 NPM supply chain attack. The attack used compromised NPM packages to inject malicious CI/CD workflows and attempt to exfiltrate internal development credentials. Our investigation confirms: - No access to customer data or databases - No impact to production API infrastructure or service availability - No m

Oct 28 , 14:02 UTC Investigating - We are currently investigating increased latency over our streaming STT API and Voice Agent API.

incidents.title: Chat models return 503 service error when /v1/chat requests omit message and chat_history while providing tool_results
incidents.message: Status: Resolved 🎉 The issue has been resolved and we are back to normal.

incidents.title: Elevated error rates for Voice Agent API when using OpenAI LLMs
incidents.message: Oct 16 , 21:00 UTC Resolved - As of 21:00 UTC on October 16th, OpenAI's LLMs are no longer returning 500 errors. Oct 9 , 23:00 UTC Investigating - We're seeing elevated error rates with OpenAI models in the Voice Agent API. Our team is actively investigating and working with OpenAI to find a path to resolution, and a path to mitigation in the short term. Our metrics show degraded service for 4o-mini, 4.1-mini, 4.1 nano, 4.1, and possibly other OpenAI models. A service degradation began at approx

incidents.title: [ISP Network-Related Issue]
incidents.message: Oct 7 , 17:18 UTC Resolved - Start: 16:15:00 UTC End: 17:18:00 UTC Streaming connectivity issues from some AWS regions may have caused Websocket failures errors and degraded connectivity

incidents.title: US Network Issues
incidents.message: Oct 3 , 04:30 UTC Resolved - This incident has been resolved. Oct 3 , 01:51 UTC Monitoring - The issue has been mitigated after rerouting traffic to avoid upstream network provider failures. Networking errors may have occurred intermittently between 12:08 am UTC and 1:51 am UTC. Oct 3 , 00:08 UTC Identified - We've identified an issue with an upstream network provider across various US regions, and are working to shift traffic to alternative routes.

incidents.title: Elevated API Errors for STT and TTS
incidents.message: Sep 24 , 13:02 UTC Resolved - Streaming and batch STT and TTS requests experienced elevated error rates due to connectivity issues in one of our regions that caused services to stop and not restart as expected. The issue has been resolved, and current status of the Deepgram API is operational. Sep 24 , 09:09 UTC Investigating - We're experiencing an elevated level of API errors for streaming and batch STT and batch TTS - are currently looking into the issue.

incidents.title: Elevated batch error rates
incidents.message: Sep 5 , 07:07 UTC Resolved - Elevated error rates were observed for requests that submitted a URL to an input audio file or used callbacks to collect the response, primarily affecting STT batch requests. Sep 5 , 04:00 UTC Investigating - We are currently investigating elevated error rates returned from STT batch requests.

incidents.title: ISP Network-Related Issue
incidents.message: Sep 4 , 14:50 UTC Resolved - This incident has been resolved. Sep 4 , 14:43 UTC Investigating - We are investigating an issue that may result in callback failures and timeouts.

incidents.title: ISP Network-Related Issue
incidents.message: Aug 26 , 18:25 UTC Resolved - Time: ~ 06:30 UTC - 07:00 UTC Summary: Streaming connectivity issues causing 'timed out during opening handshake' errors and degraded connectivity. Service is now stable. This has been resolved and root cause discovered.

incidents.title: [Voice Agent API] Connections Rejected
incidents.message: Aug 14 , 15:13 UTC Resolved - Between 2025-08-14 21:13 UTC and 2025-08-14 21:37 UTC, the Voice Agent API experienced a 20-minute outage that prevented all new connections from being established. Existing active connections were not impacted. The issue has been resolved, and current status of the Voice Agent API is operational.
